Logistics Officer Job at Eco Fleet Services




        
    

        
        Eco Fleet Services - We are a forward-thinking Nigerian transport and logistics company committed to providing sustainable, reliable, and efficient mobility solutions. Our focus is on fleet management, haulage, and CNG-powered transport services, helping clients cut costs while embracing cleaner energy alternatives.

With expertise in driver management, vehicle maintenance, road safety, and eco-friendly logistics, we ensure smooth and safe movement of goods and people across Nigeria. Guided by innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, we are shaping the future of green transport solutions in Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics Officer
     

            
    



Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Logistics Officer will coordinate and manage all logistics, driver supervision, trip monitoring, documentation, and operational reporting at Lafarge Mfamosing, ensuring efficiency and adherence to client requirements.


Key Responsibilities


	Supervise daily driver deployments, trip allocations, and return schedules.
	Liaise with Lafarge plant authorities to process trip codes, loading instructions, and weighbridge documentation.
	Monitor drivers’ conduct, compliance with safety rules, and timely escalation of incidents.
	Ensure prompt resolution of operational issues, truck breakdowns, accidents, and client complaints.
	Track fleet movement using GPS/telemetry tools and prepare daily reports.
	Verify waybills, loading slips, delivery receipts, and other documentation.
	Support technical teams in coordinating repairs and maintenance.
	Work closely with HR/Admin to enforce discipline among assigned drivers.
	Maintain strong relationship with client representatives.


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree / HND qualification in Business Admin, Logistics, Transport Management or related field.
	3 - 5 years of experience in logistics or transport operations.
	Strong supervisory skills.
	Familiarity with Lafarge operations is an added advantage.
	Strong communication and problem-solving skills.


Benefits


	Salary: N250,000 - N300,000 monthly.
	HMO – Health Insurance
	Pension
	13th Month Salary
	Paid Overtime
	Career growth opportunities
	Working with a leading national logistics brand


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.ecofleetservices@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Administrative Assistant Job at Gemameg Company Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Gemameg Company Nigeria Limited is a consultancy firm with the aim of providing services to the society. We recruit in the following areas: Yard cleaners, Plant operatives, Sweepers and Cleaners, Office Support, Technical support staff, Merchandisers, Sales Representatives, Marketers, Skilled and Un-Skilled Workers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant

Job Location: Calabar, Cross River
Employment Type: Full-time (Strictly on a 2-year contract)

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Handling office tasks, such as filing, generating reports and presentations, setting up for meetings, and reordering supplies.
	Providing real-time scheduling support by booking appointments and preventing conflicts.
	Making travel arrangements, such as booking flights and cars and making hotel and restaurant reservations.
	Screening phone calls and routing callers to the appropriate party.
	Using computers to generate reports, transcribe minutes from meetings, create presentations, and conduct research.
	Greet and assist visitors.
	Maintain polite and professional communication via phone, e-mail, and mail.
	Anticipate the needs of others in order to ensure their seamless and positive experience.


Requirements


	Associate’s Degree in a related field.
	Prior administrative experience.
	Excellent computer skills, especially typing.
	Attention to detail.
	Multilingual may be preferred or required.
	Desire to be proactive and create a positive experience for others.
	The candidates must be indigenous to Cross Rivers State and resides in Cross Rivers State currently .
	The candidate must be male and between 28 and 35 years of age.
	Must be graduates with administration experience and ready to take up the role.
	The role will be strictly on a 2-year contract.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@gemameg.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: That you must reside in Cross River to qualify for this position.

Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Age: Not more than 30 years of age
	1-2 years of experience in LAN, WLAN installation, and other computer networking.
	Qualification: OND holders only
	Good knowledge of computer hardware/software installation and troubleshooting.
	Exceptional Interpersonal and Communication Skills

	Net salary: N112,000 Net

Content Creator Job at Picadailys




        
    

        
        PICADILYS is a multi-faceted platform that offers various services to its customers. These services include value added services such a bill payments, airtime and data recharge, T.V subscriptions, betting, and gift cards. PICADAILYS also provides self-services from our partners in the areas of travels and leisure, food and drinks, fitness and entertainment , delivery services and consumables. Additionally, the platform offers brand advertising services including pay per click(PPC), pay per engagement (PPE), pay per action(PPA) and pay per mile (PPM). PICADAILYS also operates a banking/wallet service that allows users to create virtual accounts, fund wallets, transfer funds, convert currencies, obtain virtual USD cards and prepaid cards.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator

 Job Location: Rivers

Job Summary


	We’re looking for a creative, versatile, and social media–savvy Content Creator to help bring the Picadailys brand to life across digital platforms.
	The ideal candidate will be skilled in storytelling, trend awareness, and creating engaging content that connects with our audience and drives participation on the app.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop engaging content (videos, reels, graphics, stories, and captions) for Picadailys’ social media pages and marketing campaigns.
	Plan and execute creative content ideas aligned with ongoing trends, app activities, and brand objectives.
	Collaborate with the marketing and design teams to create campaigns that increase brand visibility and user engagement.
	Participate in brainstorming sessions to generate innovative ideas for challenges, features, and brand storytelling.
	Monitor performance metrics, track audience engagement, and suggest improvements.
	Stay up to date with digital trends, pop culture, and viral content styles relevant to Picadailys’ target audience.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a content creator, social media manager, or influencer (portfolio or sample links required).
	Strong understanding of social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, X, Facebook, etc.).
	Proficiency in basic content editing tools (Canva, CapCut, Adobe Premiere, or similar).
	Excellent writing and storytelling skills with a passion for creating relatable content.
	Self-driven, creative, and able to work in a fast-paced environment.
	Experience in lifestyle, youth, or fintech brands is a plus.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and performance incentives.
	Opportunity to work with a vibrant, growing tech-lifestyle brand.
	Creative freedom to shape and express the Picadailys voice.
	Access to rewards and engagement perks on the Picadailys platform.
